Name: Porcelain Tales
About the game: Porcelain Tales is a 3D platform, puzzle strategy game. Where you become a tiny garden gnome, brought to life by a generous witch in order to help her collect the things she desires most. Made of porcelain you have to be careful while exploring the world of the witch’s B&B. You have the ability to hide in narrow crannies and sneak around as quiet as a mouse. In addition, you can carry objects six times your size. During your adventure through the B&B you will encounter many obstacles to overcome and various objects to collect. Your way home won’t be easy to find, as you wander through the maze of the B&B. Features A thrilling perspective to explore the environment of a magical B&B! Try to avoid the confrontation, sneak hide and move around without being seen.
